title: Carlo has to pick an equal number of colored marbles in a box. If there are 18 red, 24 blue, and 48 green marbles, what is the greatest common number of marbles from each color he can pick? - Quora

response.answer_text: My wildest guess that seem to run through my thick skull and limited brains would be: 8 red, 16 blue and 24 green. I don’t know if this would solve your mathematical problem but I’m jotting down my guess for you to laugh at.
